summary: Chef with 15 years of highly recognized work in catering and restaurant management in 4 star hotels and leading restaurants. Specializes in creating menus that attract and retain customers for events and parties. Looking for a challenging role in culinary management. Highlights include portion and cost control, high volume production capability, P&L management, inventory management, ServSafe certified, cross training ability, and front- and back-of-house training programs. Experienced in kitchen staff training, food cost control, and menu-driven revenue enhancement.

experience.title: Chef and Restaurant Manager
experience.description: Upsold additional menu items, beverages and desserts to increase restaurant profits. Provided nutritious, safe, visually appealing and properly prepared food. Ensured quality through tasting and observation; emphasized food quality and baking techniques. Identified opportunities to increase revenue and reduce kitchen expenses; improved departmental productivity; skilled in final plate presentation.

experience.title: Chef and Sous Chef
experience.description: Tasted and smelled all prepared dishes; provided courteous customer service in an open kitchen. Implemented and supported company initiatives; managed kitchen staff for banquets and events; oversaw daily inventory, purchasing and receiving; maintained sanitation and equipment safety; prepared breakfasts and dinners for guests and VIPs.

education.degree: Associate of Arts: Specialized Culinary Technology
